entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
